title: Ranchers of North America and the Pampas

content.question: Compared to North American ranchers, commercial ranchers in the Pampas of  Argentina, Uruguay, and southern Brazil  are more likely to

choices.label: use practices developed by indigenous people

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
